desc: NIMBL combines state-of-the-art muscle recovery tools with world class instruction to help achieve athletic activity, performance, physical therapy and wellness goals. The NIMBL XLR8 and NIMBL XPRS Percussion Massage Guns are the most refined muscle recovery tools available. Welcome to NIMBL Nation. #NIMBLnation

layout.text: NIMBL offers elite muscle recovery tools like the XLR8 and XPRS percussion guns, curated educational content and accredited certification courses.
We partner with companies, first responders and sports clubs to provide white-label and NIMBL-branded products to support our common mission to improve movement, wellness and muscle recovery.
